title: Windows 7 Ultimate (HTPC) Edition
description:
Windows 7 Ultimate (HTPC) Edition (2013)

Designed for the HTPC (Home Theater Personal Computers) Movies, Music and Videos etc.


Simple Instructions

1} Burn CD.

2} Install the CD.

3} Don't worry about the key. Windows Loader with fix this.

4} As a mater of fact, uncheck that box.

5} Keep installing.

6} When the system reboots, you will be able to install the extra software:

MEDIA PLAYER CLASSIC HOME CINEMA
XBMC MEDIA CENTER
UTORRENT
EMULE XTMORPH

7}***DO NOT RUN ANY PROGRAMS**** during the install process!!!!!

8} The last program to install is the Windows Loader.  Remeber steps 3 and 4.

9} Restart

10} Choose not to show hidden files.



When installation is complete, Windows 7 Will look a lot like Windows 2000 (Built for performance).


Done 


Thanks

lproe

Thanks to the Rockers Team
